participant_1.name: Maggie
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, enjoys baking and nurturing her family.
participant_1.background: Knitting is my passion. I love to bake cookies. I am scared of dying. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I have dogs.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and family-oriented, loves spending time outdoors and is passionate about tennis.
participant_2.background: I am married to a doctor. I enjoy long walks with my dog. I am a professional tennis player. I live in a three storey house. My family is continuously growing.

content.text: hello there! how are you doing?
i am doing great and you
